_sText:
Pretty straightforward map design, based off of one I did a year back for the CSSMC zombie server. Players are spawned in a large crater, and there are movable boxes scattered everywhere.

 (In the original, there was a crane overlooking the map, and was called "dayoff"; just a crane worker goofing off, was the "backstory)

There is also, as in the original, a pretty decent concrete "structure" that can be defended, or attacked, with comparitive ease. Dead simple game play, but if it works as well as the original did, it'll be a hoot to play in a full server. Enjoy :)

And please notify me if your server plans on using this or any other map I make. It doesnt matter if you do or not, but I'd sure like to see it in action :).
